website_summaries.verdict: This is a lightweight mask with quality ingredients that works best for tight curls and coils. In spite of a few concerns, it has earned many more loyal customers than complaints.
pros: Contains matcha green tea butter that conditions tight curls and coils
Doesn't feel heavy or greasy or weigh hair down
Some users find that using a small amount as a leave-in conditioner makes curls more manageable
Doesn't contain sulfates, phthalates, or parabens
cons: Some users report that their hair felt even dryer after using it
A little difficult to rinse out

product_meta.title: DevaCurl Melt Into Moisture Conditioning Mask, 8oz
feature_bullets: MELT INTO MOISTURE HAIR MASK: The Moisture Mask rehydrates natural curls that are extremely dry, brittle, or tangled. This luxurious, creamy mask provides deep conditioning hydration that can be used once a week, or as needed. This mask works on wavy, curly, and super curly hair textures.

HYDRATES DRY, BRITTLE HAIR: The DevaCurl Conditioning Mask immerses curls in moisture without weighing them down. This intensely moisturizing treatment is formulated with matcha butter, sweet almond oil, and beetroot extract that rehydrates curls so they look shiny and feel silky-soft.

HOW TO USE: For a quick moisture boost, apply this mask after cleansing your hair and leave in for 3 minutes. For more intense hydration, cover with a plastic cap for 15-20 minutes, with or without heat. For maximum moisture, leave on overnight. Rinse thoroughly. Use once a week or as needed.
MATCHA GREEN TEA: Melt Into Moisture captures the bold scent of matcha green tea with the luxuriousness of almond oil to envelop you in an indulgent aromatic experience.
DEVACURL PROMISE: All DevaCurl products are 100% sulfate, paraben and silicone-free. They are also vegan, wheat, and cruelty-free.
